scripts.typegen: sanity schema extract --path=./schema.json && sanity typegen generate && npm run copy-types
scripts.copy-types: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const source='./generated/sanity-types.ts'; const dest1='../expo/types/sanity/sanity.ts'; const dest2='../backend/src/types/sanity-schema.ts'; fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest1),{recursive:true}); fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(dest2),{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(source,dest1); fs.copyFileSync(source,dest2);"
